DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to assess whether the ALK Grass tablet treatment is safe to use in children aged 5-12 years
DOC.brief_title: Tolerability of ALK Grass Tablet in Children
DOC.criteria: Grass pollen induced rhinoconjunctivitis Boys and girls, 512 years of age Positive skin prick test to grass pollen Severe asthma Previous treatment with immunotherapy
